name: NURTOPU
description: The adventures of the game called nurtopu are told. The aim is to collect diamonds and magic tubes and take them to the desired place and to win the boss battles. It is a 2D platform game. The game is simple to play. My aim while making this game was: to ensure that the player has a stress-free time. From this point of view, we can say "hyper casual 2d platform game".
